README:
Erlang Time Warp
================

The Time Warp synchronization algorithm written in Erlang. It implements the PHOLD testing model, it's a prototype and a lot of code is needed to use it into a stable production environment.


Awards
===============

The Version 1.0 of the Simulator has been presented in the paper[1]:

Parallel and Distributed Simulation with Erlang

accepted at the FHPC'12 conference[2].


References:

[1]: http://arxiv.org/abs/1206.2775
[2]: http://www.hiperfit.dk/fhpc12.html
